home.title: Welcome to A Vivir y Comer
home.subtitle: Discover authentic Jewish cuisine
home.description: At A Vivir & Comer, we are proud to offer a unique culinary experience with our Jewish appetizers. Each recipe is a tribute to tradition, crafted with fresh ingredients and the care of expert hands. From the sweetness of a Rugelach to the warmth of a freshly baked Challah, we invite you to explore a world of flavors that will enrich your most special moments. Furthermore, with all needs in mind, we have adapted a selection of our classics so you can also enjoy them in their gluten-free version.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Fresh ingredients and traditional recipes passed down through generations

tradition.title: Authentic Tradition
tradition.description: We respect kosher techniques and ancestral customs

variety.title: Wide Variety
variety.description: From challah to rugelach, we offer all the Jewish classics

service.title: Personalized Service
service.description: Dedicated attention for events, catering and special orders

challah.title: Challah
challah.description: Traditional braided bread, symbol of Shabbat and festivities

rugelach.title: Rugelach
rugelach.description: Delicate pastry rolls with chocolate, nuts and cinnamon fillings

babka.title: Babka
babka.description: Sweet braided bread with layers of chocolate or cinnamon

bagels.title: Bagels
bagels.description: Classic New York-style boiled and baked bagels

orders.title: Custom Orders
orders.description: Made-to-order production adapted to your specific needs
orders.details: We create custom products according to your exact specifications. Whether for a family event, religious celebration, or simply to enjoy at home, we adapt our traditional recipes to your preferences. We work with premium ingredients, respecting kosher standards and guaranteeing freshness in every delivery.

counter.title: Counter Sales
counter.description: Visit us and take your favorite fresh products of the day
counter.details: Our store in La Unión awaits you with a wide variety of fresh products made daily. You can see, choose and take your favorite Jewish appetizers on the spot. Our specialized staff will advise you on each product, its ingredients and the best ways to enjoy them. Hours: Mon-Sat 11:00-22:00, Sun 11:00-18:00.

catering.title: Event Catering
catering.description: Professional services for weddings, bar mitzvah and special events
catering.details: We transform your events into unforgettable gastronomic experiences. With over 10 years of experience in kosher catering, we offer complete services for weddings, bar/bat mitzvah, brit milah, corporate events and Jewish festive celebrations. Includes menu planning, logistical coordination, specialized staff and complete setup.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Traditional food from diverse cultures made with passion

brownie.name: Brownie
brownie.description: Dense and moist chocolate cake with intense cocoa flavor. Perfect for chocolate lovers.

cookies.name: Cookies
cookies.description: Crispy cookies with chocolate chips, nuts or raisins. Made with traditional Jewish recipe.

knish.name: Potato Knish
knish.description: Baked dough bun filled with mashed potatoes and onion. A hearty appetizer, ideal for festive meals.

masita.name: Masita
masita.description: Small decorated and flavored cookies, perfect to accompany tea or coffee. Variety of flavors and shapes.

pionono.name: Pionono
pionono.description: Thin and flexible sponge cake, rolled with dulce de leche or cream. A classic of Jewish pastry.

pletzalaj.name: Pletzalaj
pletzalaj.description: Flat and round bread, sprinkled with dehydrated onion and poppy seeds. Classic of Jewish bakery.

pletzalaj_rellena.name: Filled Pletzalaj
pletzalaj_rellena.description: Variant of pletzalaj with onion, potato or cheese filling. More substantial and flavorful.

rol_canela.name: Cinnamon Roll
rol_canela.description: Sweet bread rolled with sugar, cinnamon and butter. Soft and aromatic, perfect for breakfast.

strudel.name: Strudel
strudel.description: Rolled pastry with thin and crispy dough, traditionally filled with apples, cinnamon and raisins. A comforting dessert.

tarta_manzana.name: Apple Tart
tarta_manzana.description: A classic dessert with generous filling of apple slices, cinnamon and sugar, covered with shortcrust pastry.

trigona_puerro.name: Leek Trigona
trigona_puerro.description: Triangular phyllo pastry filled with leek and cheese. Perfect savory appetizer for any occasion.

chivito.name: Chivito
chivito.description: Uruguayan sandwich with beef, ham, cheese, egg and vegetables. One of Uruguay's most emblematic dishes.

empanada_carne.name: Beef Empanada
empanada_carne.description: Criolla empanada filled with spiced ground beef. Perfect for sharing or as a starter.

alfajor.name: Alfajor
alfajor.description: Traditional sweet with two cookies joined by dulce de leche and covered in chocolate.

torta_frita.name: Torta Frita
torta_frita.description: Traditional Uruguayan fried dough, perfect for rainy days with mate.

asado.name: Asado
asado.description: Uruguayan-style grilled meat. The most emblematic dish of River Plate gastronomy, slowly cooked over embers.

hallaca.name: Hallaca
hallaca.description: Venezuelan tamale filled with beef, pork, chicken, olives, raisins and capers. Christmas dish par excellence.

cachapa.name: Cachapa
cachapa.description: Fresh corn pancake with hand cheese. Natural sweetness of corn with the salty touch of cheese.

arepa.name: Arepa
arepa.description: Venezuelan corn bread that can be filled with various ingredients. Versatile and delicious.

tequeño.name: Tequeño
tequeño.description: White cheese fingers wrapped in dough and fried until golden and crispy.

taco.name: Taco
taco.description: Corn tortilla with grilled meat, cilantro, onion and salsa. Icon of Mexican food.

burrito.name: Burrito
burrito.description: Large flour tortilla filled with meat, beans, rice, cheese and vegetables.

quesadilla.name: Quesadilla
quesadilla.description: Flour tortilla with melted cheese, can include chicken, beef or vegetables.

churros.name: Churros
churros.description: Fried dough sprinkled with sugar and cinnamon. Perfect with hot chocolate.

pizza.name: Pizza Margherita
pizza.description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella and basil. Simple and delicious.

pasta_carbonara.name: Pasta Carbonara
pasta_carbonara.description: Pasta with creamy sauce of egg, pecorino cheese, pancetta and black pepper.

lasagna.name: Lasagna
lasagna.description: Layers of pasta with meat ragù, bechamel sauce and gratinated cheese.

tiramisu.name: Tiramisu
tiramisu.description: Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone and cocoa.

cannoli.name: Cannoli
cannoli.description: Crispy fried dough roll filled with sweetened ricotta with chocolate chips.

kosher.title: Kosher Quality
kosher.description: All our products follow strict kosher standards

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Same-day delivery for orders before 2:00 PM

traditional.title: Traditional Recipes
traditional.description: Passed down from generation to generation

catering.title: Catering Service
catering.subtitle: Transform your events into unforgettable experiences
catering.description: With over 10 years of experience, we offer specialized catering in Jewish gastronomy for all types of events.

planning.title: Complete Planning
planning.description: We coordinate all details from menu to decoration

custom.title: Custom Menus
custom.description: We adapt each dish to your preferences and kosher requirements

professional.title: Professional Team
professional.description: Trained and experienced staff in events
